job.title: Data Warehouse Engineer
job.description: Job Title: Data Warehouse LeadLocation: Vancouver, WAJob Type: ContractVisa: USC, GCJob Description:Expert-level knowledge of data warehousing patterns and processesExpert-level knowledge of SAP Data Services platform, including configuration, development, testing, and administrationSolid knowledge of ETL patterns and processes, including data quality and data privacy managementSolid knowledge of data integration patterns and processes, including batch and streaming architecturesSolid knowledge of Oracle 12c database (or greater) and ANSI-SQL and PL/SQL languagesSolid knowledge of Power BI development and processesSolid knowledge of testing strategies and automation specific to data pipelinesFamiliarity with agile development practicesFamiliarity with Microsoft Azure platform including common data pipeline and automation tools and integration gatewaysFamiliarity with DataOps principles for driving data quality throughout the application lifecycleFamiliarity with metadata managementExperience working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environmentGood documentation habits and judgmentGood task management, status reporting, and adaptability to change.If you are interested kindly apply through the below link:https://bit.ly/3yWeZQnRecruiter Details:Mohamed sheik(302) 310-5458sheikmd_us@falconsmartit.comFind all current job openings at our Career Pagehttps://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.htmlFollow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunitieshttps://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
